# The `indexed_accessor_range_base` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The class represents the base of a range of indexed&#95;accessor&#95;iterators. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The class represents the base of a range of indexed&#95;accessor&#95;iterators.

It provides support for many different range functionalities, e.g. drop&#95;front/slice/etc.. Derived range classes must implement the following static methods:
<ul>
<li>ReferenceT dereference&#95;iterator(const BaseT &amp;base, ptrdiff&#95;t index)
<ul>
<li>Dereference an iterator pointing to the base object at the given index.</li>
</ul></li>
<li>BaseT offset&#95;base(const BaseT &amp;base, ptrdiff&#95;t index)
<ul>
<li>Return a new base that is offset from the provide base by &#39;index&#39; elements.</li>
</ul></li>
</ul>

Definition at line 1256 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.

### front() {#a0eb48a212d6513eb931a922855e1a845}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename DerivedT, typename BaseT, typename T, typename PointerT = T &#42;, typename ReferenceT = T &amp;&gt;</>}
